xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/363679-Black Roses: The Killing of Sophie Lancaster 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jpnrsfQ85R1aZFhZs8jBzfwuBFW.jpg In 2007, Sophie Lancaster was beaten to death because of her appearance. Her story is told through a sequence of poems by Simon Armitage and through the interviews made by her mother in the wake of the tragedy. Adapted for television from the poetry anthology/stage production and radio adaptation. Black Roses: The Killing of Sophie Lancaster
